verbose_text: Western blot analysis showed that TGF-beta induced the upregulation of Twist2 and ZEB2, but not Twist, Snail or Slug in the A549 cells, and the TGF-beta-induced-upregulation of Twist2 and ZEB2 was prominantly suppressed when A549 cells were concomitantly treated with TGF-beta and bufalin (XREF_FIG).
evidence: TGF-beta induced the upregulation of Twist2 and ZEB2, but not Twist, Snail or Slug
